title: Bad Boys 1983 1080p mp4 2.25 Gb
description:
Academy Award winner Sean Penn is Mick O'Brien, a rough Chicago teen torn between petty crime and the love of his girlfriend (Ally Sheedy). But when the heist of a local drug dealer (Esai Morales) goes tragically wrong, Mick is sentenced to a brutal juvenile prison where violence is a rite of passage and respect is measured in vengeance. Is Mick headed for a life of crime - or can he find the strength to turn himself around before it's too late? 

Bad Boys and Fast times at Ridgemont High are two of Sean Penns best movies in my opinion.  Add this classic movie to your collection and help seed.
